ARABIC: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبًا مَّفْرُوضًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: whom Allah has cursed. He said, 'I will take a certain fixed proportion of Your slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who was condemned by God and who said: "I shall take from Thy creatures my determinate share,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: upon whom Allah has laid His curse. He said (to Allah): 'I will take to myself an appointed portion of Your servants
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God condemned Satan when he said, "I will certainly take my revenge from Your servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The one whom Allah has cursed; and the devil said, “I swear, I will certainly take an appointed portion of Your bondmen,” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah cursed him. And he [Shaytan] said: "I will take an appointed portion of your servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah has cursed him; and he said: Most certainly I will take of Thy servants an appointed portion:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Assuredly I will take unto myself a portion appointed of Thy servants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whom Allah cursed, and he said: Surely I will take of Thy bondmen an appointed portion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: whom God has rejected. He said [to God], "I will assuredly take a number of Your servants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah hath accursed him. And he said: surely shall take of Thine bondmen a portion allotted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: whom Allah has cursed, and who said, ‘I will surely take of Your servants a settled share,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah did curse him, but he said: "I will take of Thy servants a portion Marked off;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah cursed him. And he [Shaitan (Satan)] said: "I will take an appointed portion of your slaves;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: whom Allah has cursed and he (satan) said: 'Indeed, I will take to myself an appointed portion of Your worshipers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God has cursed him. And he said, “I will take to myself my due share of Your servants.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Whom Allah has cursed. For he had said, "I will surely take from among Your servants a specific portion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:118] God has cursed him, He has removed him from His mercy. And he, namely, Satan, said, ‘Assuredly I will take to myself, I will appoint for myself, an appointed portion, an apportioned share, of Your servants, [whom] I shall call to obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Whom Allah cursed) Allah has banished him from all good, (and he) Satan (said: Surely I will take) I will overcome and make slip (of Thy bondmen an appointed portion) an appointed share, and that which I imprint in him shall be his obligation and command; it is also said that this means: out of every thousand people, 999 are destined for the Fire.
